title: Mount Chimborazo Seen through Rising Mist and Clouds
provenance: Gift of Louis P. Church; Frederic E. Church
medium: Brush and oil paint, traces of graphite on thin paperboard
description: Snow-covered peak rises above range at left, enshrouded by gray mist. Moon appears at right through dark clouds. Ochre-colored foreground contains foothills and schematic graphic notations of landscape.
name: Drawing
